register.title: REGISTER
register.error_email_in_use: Email is already in use. Try another.
register.error_weak_password: The password is too weak. Use at least 6 characters.
register.success_verification_email: Verification email sent. Check your inbox.

question_1.title: What is the function of the Quantity section when making a donation?
question_1.content: This section is specifically designed to provide details about the products you wish to donate, including the quantity of each type of product and its condition (new, used, etc.).

question_2.title: How can I view my donations?
question_2.content: You can view your donations in the “Donations” menu, under the “Latest Donations” section. There they will be displayed in order, so you can review the donations you have made.

question_3.title: How does the food donations section work?
question_3.content: In this section, you will have to select three types of food from those available. With this information, you will be able to obtain a specific recipe based on the food you choose.

question_4.title: How can I contact technical support?
question_4.content: To contact technical support, there is a section in the configuration screen that offers several ways to contact them. You can choose the option that is most convenient for you to receive assistance.

terms.acceptance: 1. Acceptance: By using RIGUU, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, do not use the app.
terms.use_of_application: 2. Use of the application: RIGUU is for personal use, not commercial. You must use it ethically.
terms.intellectual_property: 3. Intellectual Property: All content on RIGUU is owned by the app or its licensors. You cannot copy it without permission.
terms.privacy: 4. Privacy: RIGUU collects data according to its privacy policy. Your information is protected.
terms.location: 5. Location: The app may use your location to show nearby collection centers.

tips_med.title: Medication Recycling in Mexico
tips_med.description: Below are links to various websites where you can find information on how to safely and responsibly dispose of and recycle medications.
tips_med.link2: Gaceta UNAM - Risks of Expired Medications
